mapper.select: select bc.*, bu.username from b_comment bc left join b_user bu on bu.id = bc.user_id and bu.is_deleted = 0 where bc.is_deleted = 0 and bc.article_id = #{articleId} and bc.parent_id = -1 order by bc.gmt_create DESC

select bc.*, bu.username from b_comment bc left join b_user bu on bu.id = bc.user_id and bu.is_deleted = 0 where bc.is_deleted = 0 and bc.article_id = #{articleId} and (bc.parent_id = #{id} or bc.first_parent_id = #{id}) order by bc.gmt_create DESC
select bu.username as applyParentName from b_comment bc left join b_user bu on bu.id = bc.user_id and bu.is_deleted = 0 where bc.is_deleted = 0 and bc.id = #{parentId}
